function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential contamination of sewage with viral RNA from COVID-19 patients","Impact":"Risk of spreading SARS-CoV-2 through sewage and waterborne transmission","Mitigation":"Regular testing of sewage for SARS-CoV-2 presence, implementing water treatment processes to eliminate viral RNA","Technologies":"Wastewater monitoring systems, advanced water treatment technologies","People":"Public using water and sewage systems, workers at wastewater treatment plants","Owner":"Public health authorities, water treatment facilities"},{"Description":"Lack of insight into the presence of SARS-CoV-2 in wastewater in Italy","Impact":"Limited knowledge of viral spread in sewage, potential for unidentified transmission routes","Mitigation":"Conducting sewage testing for SARS-CoV-2 presence, implementing comprehensive wastewater surveillance programs","Technologies":"Wastewater testing kits, genetic sequencing for viral detection","People":"Residents of Italy, public health experts","Owner":"Government health agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Excretion of fecal-oral viruses at high concentration in sewage","Impact":"Increased risk of waterborne and fecal-oral virus transmission","Mitigation":"Enhanced sewage treatment processes, public health education on water hygiene","Technologies":"Advanced sewage treatment systems, public health communication tools","People":"Public using water and sewage systems, workers at wastewater treatment plants","Owner":"Public health authorities, water treatment facilities"}]}
